Improve logistics and ticket management from the dashboard on
helpdesk.ticket.team.

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

***************
 Configuration
***************

No configuration needed for this module.

*******
 Usage
*******

This module customizes a new kanban view for helpdesk tickets, which
includes:

-  Add "Unassigned team" as helpdesk ticket team so tickets can be
   assigned to it.
-  Substitute "Unassigned" for "My Tickets" filter in the kanban view.
-  Prioritize helpdesk.ticket tree view instead of kanban when clicking
   on any team dashboard view.
-  Add translations
